00030 namespace detail {
00031 
00038 class CountingExpression : public ExpressionBase<CountingExpression> {
00039 public:
00040     typedef ExpressionTraits<CountingExpression>::Element Element;
00041     typedef ExpressionTraits<CountingExpression>::ND ND;
00042     typedef ExpressionTraits<CountingExpression>::Iterator Iterator;
00043     typedef ExpressionTraits<CountingExpression>::Value Value;
00044     typedef ExpressionTraits<CountingExpression>::Reference Reference;
00045     typedef Vector<int,1> Index;
00046     
00047     CountingExpression(int stop=0) : _stop(stop) { NDARRAY_ASSERT(stop >= 0); }
00048 
00049     Reference operator[](int n) const {
00050         return n;
00051     }
00052 
00053     Iterator begin() const {
00054         return Iterator(0);
00055     }
00056 
00057     Iterator end() const {
00058         return Iterator(_stop);
00059     }
00060 
00061     template <int P> int getSize() const {
00062         BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT(P==0);
00063         return _stop;
00064     }
00065 
00066     Index getShape() const {
00067         return makeVector(_stop);
00068     }
00069 
00070 private:
00071     int _stop;
00072 };
00073 
00074 template <typename T>
00075 class RangeTransformer {
00076     T _offset;
00077     T _scale;
00078 public:
00079     typedef int argument_type;
00080     typedef T result_type;
00081 
00082     explicit RangeTransformer(T const & offset, T const & scale) : _offset(offset), _scale(scale) {}
00083 
00084     T operator()(int n) const { return static_cast<T>(n) * _scale + _offset; }
00085 };
00086 
00087 } // namespace detail
00088 
00090 inline detail::CountingExpression arange(int stop) {
00091     return detail::CountingExpression(stop);
00092 }
00093 
00095 inline detail::UnaryOpExpression< detail::CountingExpression, detail::RangeTransformer<int> >
00096 arange(int start, int stop, int step = 1) {
00097     NDARRAY_ASSERT(step != 0);
00098     int size = stop - start;
00099     if (step < -1) ++size;
00100     if (step > 1) --size;
00101     size /= step;
00102     return vectorize(
00103         detail::RangeTransformer<int>(start,step),
00104         detail::CountingExpression(size)
00105     );
00106 }
